EmailTemplate.name: TIDS_CR_Incomplete_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} | Feedback Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your TIDS Change Request is Incomplete
Your attention is required.
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We have reviewed Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber} for a {!Case.Subject} In order to proceed with your request, additional information is required. Please take a moment to review the comments below which explain where clarifications are needed.
Supporting Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Request Status {!Case.Status}
Information Requested
{!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
Kindly provide your response at your earliest directly through Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber}, accessible via the IATA Customer Portal.
If we do not receive your response within 30 days, you will be required to submit a new change request.
Please do not reply to this email as this inbox is not monitored.
Thank you for choosing TIDS, IATA's program for standard identification of non-accredited travel sellers.
The IATA TIDS Team
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email}. Please do not reply to this email as this address is not monitored. International Air Transport Association. 800 Square Victoria, Montreal, H4Z 1M1, Canada Â© Copyright 2020. All rights reserved. https://www.iata.org
